StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: Snathi Tech Tree

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Techs scavenged from many races, and giving an evil twist.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechTree_Dec
StringTable.String: Techs scavenged from many races, and giving an evil twist.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations mankind has dreamed of setting foot on other worlds. That dream is now a reality. Feet are being set on other worlds. We're setting lots of things on other worlds actually.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoIndustrializationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Industrialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoIndustrializationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoIndustrializationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Everything is harder on the surface of an alien world, every machine we own having to be adjusted for the differences in gravity or atmosphere, all our old constants and empirical shortcuts having to be thrown out and re-written.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Manufacturing Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no sense stopping at "basic competence" when it comes to making things in alien environments. We should probably learn from the many mistakes we're still making, for example, if only to improve our manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our rapidly expanding frontiers have made available thousands and thousands of new things to look at under a microscope. Expanding our research capabilities will allow our scientists to keep up.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of building manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Having found out what works and doesn't work on alien planets, we've been able to standardize and modularize our building construction practices a bit, which should reduce building costs across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAdvancedConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Construction

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAdvancedConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAdvancedConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in material sciences has given us the tools to build bigger and bolder, to finally catch up with some of the wilder imaginings our architects have come up with.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Every time we ramp up the scale of our manufacturing, we also ramp up the scale of our mistakes. It takes time and effort to weed those out, but it needs to be done if we want to reach our true manufacturing potential.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We resisted letting the accountants into the manufacturing centers for a long time, because the work is dangerous and also because no-one likes them. But once they found a way to sneak in, they did admittedly find several ways to cut manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Factories and manufacturing plants generate a lot of toxic byproducts which are expensive to dispose of. By making our manufacturing processes even a bit less wasteful, we expect to see broad cost savings over the life of a plant.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoManufacturingMethods_Name
StringTable.String: Precision Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoManufacturingMethods_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoManufacturingMethods_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more precise manufacturing processes have resisted the move off-world, struggling with the broad range of environments they're now exposed to. We think we've got it now, but nevertheless still recommend you invest in extended warranties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Tooling our manufacturing centers to specialize in military production sends a pretty unfriendly message to anyone paying close attention to us. But it should make the boys and girls in adaptive camo fatigues happy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves civilian manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the unforeseen side-effects of managing a civilization on this scale is finding things to do with all these people. Keeping them happy is as important as keeping them safe, and they can sometimes be pretty difficult about it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We thought we cleared them out after the last time, but some more accountants managed to slip in to our manufacturing centers. Or they're living in the walls now. Regardless, they've found some more ways for us to reduce our manufacturing overhead.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialExpertise_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Expertise

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialExpertise_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialExpertise_Dec
StringTable.String: By manipulating materials at the atomic level, we can now construct things of unparalleled precision. This has massively expanded our industrial capacity, along with creating an entirely new class of pretty terrifying workplace safety issues.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Military Assembly

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We're slowly eking out the last possible efficiencies in our military manufacturing processes, our civilization slowly turning into a war machine itself.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Social Construction Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves social manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Few of our civilians seem to realize the challenge of constructing the farms, hospitals, and entertainment complexes that they rely on to survive. And yet every time we try to tell them how good we're doing it now, they just yawn and walk away.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSlavePits_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin are plain crazy -- relying on slaves to do all their production. Still it does seem stupid to not take advantage of all those prisoners that we have been acquiring lately.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSlaveMills_Dec
StringTable.String: We are starting to think that the Drengin have something with this whole slavery thing. Slaves do seem to come in handy in a pinch.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArtificialSlaves_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial slaves are the best thing ever! They don't complain and they don't pick on our size. They just work, work, work. Lets make more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularFabricationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Fabrication

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularFabricationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Molecular Fabricator

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularFabricationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Iconians's are always telling us that they are so ancient and wise. But as the true hairs of the Dread Lords, we are able to puzzle out even their oldest and most arcane technologies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Manufacturing of your colonies

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have been able to use Molecular Fabrication techniques, to greatly increase the output of our factories, with no additional resources or cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Farming

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Food supply of your colonies

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have been able to use Molecular Fabrication techniques to greatly increase the output of our farms, with no additional resources or cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Computers

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Research output of our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have been able to use Molecular Fabrication techniques to greatly increases the output of our research facilities, with no additional resources or cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialReplicationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Replication

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialReplicationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Industrial Replicator

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialReplicationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: This is the Ultimate evolution of Molecular Fabrication. With Industrial Replication we can create anything we want, from anything we have.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiObservation_Name
StringTable.String: Observation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiObservation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let us study the technology of other races.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiObservation_Dec
StringTable.String: The Snathi are known thoughout the galaxy as the ultimate Scavengers. Not just for the ships we take, but for the technologies that we glean from the simple observation of our enemies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXeonMysticism_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Mysticism

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXeonMysticism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Social Matrix.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXeonMysticism_Dec
StringTable.String: The Altarians use "The Social Matrix" as a place to interact with and judge their peers. We do the same, but we call it name-calling and brawling. However, it has the additional effect of blowing off steam and making us stronger and more productive.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorHistory2_Name
StringTable.String: Way of the Dread Lords

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorHistory2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost military production and soldiering.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorHistory2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our appreciation of the strength of will possessed by the Dread Lords gives every planet in our civilization a boost to its military production capacity. This inspiration makes all of our soldiers more effective.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDarkEnergeyReseach_Name
StringTable.String: Dark Energy Research

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDarkEnergeyReseach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Dark Energy Lab.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDarkEnergeyReseach_Dec
StringTable.String: The Dark Energy Lab harnasses the secret energy source of the Dread Lords. The energy provides a massive bonus to research and production on a planet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInstitutionalResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Institutional Research

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInstitutionalResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInstitutionalResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: We're at our best when we're not just living in this universe, but observing it. Figuring it out. Sometimes dismantling small parts of it. By setting up special places for that to happen, we expect research breakthroughs to occur much more frequently.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Research

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've improved and made more efficient many of our research practices, which should lead to faster research, or at the very least, less researchers complaining about red tape.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Cost Reduction

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the manufacturing cost of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: In the rush to begin processing and analyzing all the new data our rapid expansion has provided, a number of horribly wasteful research practices became commonplace. By eliminating those we should be able to make our research quite a bit cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Research

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Research labs are full of expensive toys which are in a near constant state of breaking down. By considering how to do some of this more sustainably, we expect to see broad cost savings over the life of a lab.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchCenters_Name
StringTable.String: Research Centers

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchCenters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchCenters_Dec
StringTable.String: By putting all of our smartest people and their favorite toys into the same building, we expect to see significant improvements in our ability to research new fields. Also, we'll give them food so they have no reason to leave.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechnologicalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on pure research we have been able to get a significant improvement on the rate of new discoveries.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechnologicalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on our research infrastructure we have been able to cut down the cost of building new facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechnologicalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing how our researchers work and eliminating some of the more wasteful experiments, we have been able to significantly reduce the maintenance of our research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntegratedResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Integrated Research

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntegratedResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntegratedResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: We've made great strides in our understanding of the universe, and now require larger academies to facilitate the multi-disciplinary studies needed to push back the veil further. The researchers are also demanding something called a "faculty bar."

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchMatrixTech_Name
StringTable.String: Research Matrix

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Imagine millions of scientists, working in a city-sized research facility, with none of the distractions of the outside world like weather or basic social contact. Yes, some will turn into psychopaths. But we were planning to keep an eye on them anyways.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDeeperKnowledge_Name
StringTable.String: Deeper Knowledge

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDeeperKnowledge_Dec
StringTable.String: Our understanding of the universe has grown by leaps and bounds. Teams who have made an effort to slow down and consider some of the implications of these discoveries are now revealing deeper patterns in the fabric of reality.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiQuantumUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Understanding

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiQuantumUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest facilities are no longer groping blindly at the edge of the sub-atomic world. For one thing there are twenty edges, and they're less edges than toroids, and there are actually now zero of them. It turns out reality is super complicated.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced deep research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeyondMortality_Dec
StringTable.String: Ascension will make us immortal, and usher us into a reality that is beyond this one. What lies there remains a mystery, but we've never backed away from those before.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Improvement

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of civilian buildings. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Half the fun of moving to a new place is fixing it up to suit your needs. That's harder when the new place is an entire alien planet, but we're finally developing the tools and techniques to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farming technology has improved dramatically, and we're beginning to see enhanced crop yields as a result. The carrots still have that weird taste, but we're working on it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're able to modulate the effects an alien world has on fertility, our population growth rates are beginning to trend upwards. More babies for now, but more workers soon enough.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We're no longer just surviving on new worlds, but thriving there. Thanks to improved nutrient yields and preservation techniques, our workers can work longer and harder, improving the production capacity of our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farms. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our agricultural expertise to fit a variety of alien environments has proven challenging, and taken many simultaneous advances in our understanding of soil, atmospheric science, and shovels. That's right. On some planets, we need special shovels.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our planting, feeding, and harvesting regimens to account for differences in the seasons of alien worlds takes a lot of effort and has to be fine tuned on every planet. But now that we're able to do it, we expect to see greater food yields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have more experience growing food on alien worlds, our agricultural engineers are able to predict in advance what farming equipment a colony will need before its formed, leading to lower startup costs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By taking a step back from the cutting edge of agricultural science, and using older, more reliable equipment, we can reduce the costs of running most of our farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntensiveFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntensiveFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Maximizing the food production of a given plot of soil is an expensive but very necessary step for those worlds where arable land comes at a premium.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The microbes present in alien soil react differently to nutrients than we're used to, and it's taken awhile to fine tune our fertilization techniques to keep our own plants fed. But now that we have, we expect to see even greater food production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've finally homed in on the species and strains of plants which adapt to the widest range of environments. By focusing our production efforts on these crops, the startup costs for any farm should now be much more manageable.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Farmers throughout our civilization are tackling unique agricultural challenges every day. By implementing civilization-wide information sharing systems, we can spread our best practices further, reducing farming operational costs everywhere.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLosslessFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Farming

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLosslessFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLosslessFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Improvements in our recycling and nutrient delivery systems have led to almost perfectly efficient farms. Our farmers don't even need to get their hands dirty now, and are actually getting a bit precious about it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our food production capacity has taken another step forward. Also, we finally gotten that weird taste out of the carrots, but it turns out that everyone now likes it, so we had to put it back.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Abundance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Farms increase population growth.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have such an excessive quantity of food now that many of our people have taken it almost as a challenge to create families capable of consuming it all.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSlaveringRecycling_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Recycling

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSlaveringRecycling_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost Food production and Population Growth

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSlaveringRecycling_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin are right about one thing: slaves can be tasty. The thing they don't realize is that deep fried Drengin are to die for. Literally.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows soil enhancement and improves adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentalEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to improve and enhance the environment we work in will provide benefits to almost every aspect of colonization, and make walks in the outdoors a little less deadly.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases manufacturing adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tweaking our environmental modifications to accommodate the high-energy and resource demands of the manufacturing sector, we expect to see improved production. And less environment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases research adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have a variety of environmental needs, from supplies of clean air and water, to high quality land for research farms. By accommodating them, we can expect to see faster and more efficient research.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases economic adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Representatives of private business continually ask us for small portions of clear, flat land, rid of all those awful alien plants and rocks. If we give it to them, we'll both get them off our backs, and boost the local economy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on extreme worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiExtremeWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer are we limited to the low-hanging fruit of the galaxy's stock of planets. It won't be an easy life for anyone living on these new worlds, but it will be a life.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience dealing with the challenges of life on aquatic worlds has allowed us to make living there almost as comfortable as everywhere else in our civilization. Bathing caps are no longer mandatory.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now so good at living on snowball worlds that many colonists go days at a time without using mittens, something which would have been considered wildly reckless even a few years ago.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It took some expensive, massively invasive water recycling technology to do it, but life on barren worlds is now more or less as productive as anywhere else. The catheters are now much more comfortable too.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on radioactive and toxic worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAtmosphericCleansing_Dec
StringTable.String: Even the foulest and most toxic planetary environments can now be colonized by us. Good luck to the poor bastards who go for it, but at least they'll now have a fighting chance.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBiospherePerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: The mutations and genetic defects which were a fact of life for the early colonists of radioactive worlds are now a thing of the past. Any further mutations will be left in place for cosmetic purposes only.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBiospherePerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered the challenges of living on even the most poisonous of planets. You still won't want to go outside without your helmet, but we've moved most of the places worth going inside anyways.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTerraformingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTerraformingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Terraforming is a tricky business, delicately poised between making a world more habitable for us without destroying its entire biosphere to do so. And there aren't any do-overs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHabitatImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate the biosphere has improved to the point that we can treat entire continents as a canvas. Will we paint a portrait of a thriving and prosperous civilization? Or the equivalent of writing our names in the snow in urine?

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the use of almost useless terrain.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSoilReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: Many planets do a very poor job of making terrain usable for colonial purposes. Where nature has dropped the ball, we've stepped in, and are now capable of developing what were once very marginal locations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the amount of usable land on all colonized planets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentalResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: We're playing with powerful forces now, capable of manipulating planetary terrain on a scale never seen before. We must be sure to use this power wisely, or at least not actively for evil.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations, we've looked up at the stars and wondered, "What if?" Well buckle up, because "if" has happened. By bending space around our ships we can use conventional propulsion in a pocket of normal space while accelerating at incredible speeds.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: Even at the incredible speeds we can travel at now, if we want to journey anywhere beyond the closest stars we'll need to make significant improvements to our navigational and life support systems. More refined hyperdrives wouldn't hurt either.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After analyzing how our first generation of hyperdrives have (and haven't) worked, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our ships' speeds.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large Support Modules through space is inherently wasteful, by miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, we can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: After listening to the complaints and coughs of our returning crews, we've improved the life support recirculation systems of our ships, which should marginally increase their effective range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By using magnetic fields to capture ions from the interstellar medium during hyperdrive flight, we can funnel this additional mass into the exhaust of our engines, increasing our overall speed. Called Ion Drives, they make us go faster, basically.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ion capture technology of our Ion Drives requires a fiendish amount of tuning that our ship's engineers are only just learning to automate. Once this work is done, we should see slightly higher speeds across our fleet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperfield generators are no longer the rare pieces of equipment they once were, and we're beginning to see efficiencies of scale that have reduced the unit-cost for each one.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Every year our hyperdrives get more efficient and smaller. Less room for the engines means more room for everything else, benefiting every type of ship we could conceive of.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are now able to "stack" up the space-bending fields of our hyperdrives, magnifying their acceleration effect. They call these stacked arrangements "Warp Fields" and are now using them to create vastly more powerful engines.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tuning the arrangement of stacked hyperfields in a variety of dimensions, we've found some surprisingly cheap ways to improve the speed of our Warp Drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're using stacked fields and multi-field generators, even the most minuscule improvement in cost-efficiency can lead to significant savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience working with the effects of stacked hyperfields, we've determined that we were stacking them inefficiently. Smaller field generators can achieve the same effects as their fatter predecessors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Waves consist of warp fields cascading in front of the vessel, allowing a warp drive to effectively compress already compressed space. That glosses over a number of complicated mathematical issues, but the end result is even faster drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: No other civilization in the galaxy can match ours for the ease and efficiency with which we build our drives. And still human ingenuity can find ways to make them cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered hyperfield technology, and are now capable of wringing the most possible speed from even the smallest engines.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar folding bends space on a scale never seen before, hyperfields approaching the diameter of a star. Our ships are now the fastest in the galaxy, and perhaps the fastest the galaxy has ever seen.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Careful analysis of the way hyperfield waves interact when ships are travelling in formation has revealed the possibility of building larger field generators capable of increasing the drive efficiency of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: It took a long time to finally find the graviton. It turned out to be inside us the whole time. But now we can use it to generate massive artificial gravity fields, which should improve the maneuverability and tactical options of our ships in combat.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: By analyzing the interference effects of multiple hyperwave fields from different ships travelling in close proximity, we can now limit the speed of enemy ships within the range of a properly equipped starbase.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: The Stellar Field Projector allows properly equipped ships to effectively "tow" ships with less capable drives. The same technology will help us improve the hyperfield enhancing capabilities of our support modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: "Look before you leap," is excellent advice in all sorts of aspects of life and galactic civilization building. Now we finally have the sensor and survey tools for our ships to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of nano-processors allow us to more rapidly process the massive volumes of information our sensors return, improving the overall effectiveness of our sensor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The hyperfield detectors which our sensors use were originally cobbled together from left over drives. Now that we have dedicated sensor manufacturing equipment, we can expect to see some significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest sensors were crude, jury-rigged things, and if we begin swapping out their parts for dedicated sensor-specific equipment, we should see significant weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Improvements in our understanding of the effects of space folding have revealed that hyperdrives are detectable at much greater distances than previously believed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our technicians have found that by turning one of the knobs up, our sensor systems can see a bit further. We feel kind of dumb for not realizing this before.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sensor systems had several redundant parts, which when stripped out has led to the production of cheaper, more efficient systems. The accountants are all very excited.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The creation of high-density field detection components should lead to more compact sensors, leaving our ship designers more room to install guns. Everyone wins. Except the people the guns are pointed at.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSubspaceSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace is the 12-dimension space that lies at right angles to and a little bit behind our universe, and it took us a very long time to figure out how to look at it. The upshot is that we can now build a new generation of very powerful sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: When a ragtag group of science-accountants teamed up with the goal of identifying cost savings in our most advanced sensor systems, few believed they had a chance. Many openly mocked them. Some people spit on them. But somehow they managed it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of our newest sensor systems has revealed that several of their components don't technically have to exist in this universe. By shifting their workload into another plane, we can reduce the amount of mass we have to lug around in ours.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiRecovery_Name
StringTable.String: Recovery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiRecovery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Learn to make use of the resources already floating around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiRecovery_Dec
StringTable.String: There is plenty of perfectly good stuff out there in the galaxy that we can make use of. With a little effort, we can get our little hands on that stuff before anyone else does.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavenging_Name
StringTable.String: Scavenging

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavenging_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost our Scavenging Rate when victorious in battle.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavenging_Dec
StringTable.String: Why build new ships? With a little repair work, you can use your enemy's ships against them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Research Scavenging

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Use salvaged ships to boost Research per turn.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that if we carefully dismantle some of the enemy ships we salvage, we are able to learn some fun new tricks. This should greatly increase our research rates.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Structural Scavenging

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Use salvaged ships to strengthen your fleets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: After studying some of the ships we have scavenged we now realize that we might want to focus more on the integrity of our hulls. It seems to have the added advantage of keeping them in one piece.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Scavenging

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to repair scavenged ships quicker after battle.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our crews have found new and exciting new ways to repair the ships they scavenge at a record pace. This has the added advantage of making repairs more efficient on their own ships as well.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCreativeRecycling_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Recycling

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCreativeRecycling_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Scavenging Rate and boosts Military Production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCreativeRecycling_Dec
StringTable.String: Our fleets have become so efficient at scavenging enemy ships that they have found that found better ways to recylce these ships. This has given us a substantial boost to Manufacturing on all our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiUltimateScavengers_Name
StringTable.String: Ultimate Scavengers

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiUltimateScavengers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts our Scavenging Rate when victorious in battles.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiUltimateScavengers_Dec
StringTable.String: Our fleets have learned where to exactly to hit in order to disable ships. As a result, our Scavenging Rates are at an all time high.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time we've known of a race, or races, of long dead aliens called the Precursors. It's taken some time to adapt our survey systems to identify their relics, but now that we have, we hope to learn a few of their secrets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've had an opportunity to study a few precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns in them which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic research benefits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding Precursor artifacts involves throwing out many of our pre-conceived notions about technology. Their interfaces don't just assume we have different anatomy; they assume we have different ways of thinking entirely.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic cultural benefits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The public seems fascinated by the Precursors, and the relics we've found have had a surprising effect on our society. We can now try to capitalize on these cultural benefits. Souvenirs. Wacky catchphrases. Things like that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic economic benefits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of the Precursor relics we find are a mystery to us, doing little more than generating patterns of pretty lights. Though it turns out there is a massive consumer market for pretty lights which we might want to capitalize on.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to try recreating some of the Precursor's technology. Extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to continue this work, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor relics reveal their secrets to us with ease now, and we're close to building our own relics ourselves. We have almost as full an understanding of Precursor technology as the Precursors did themselves.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems surprising that the factor limiting the travel range for our ships is its life support system, but there you have it. For anything less than a colony ship, keeping the occupants alive is now a bigger challenge than keeping the engines fueled.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience with the rigors of space travel, and the shrieked radio transmissions of the few who fell to the rigors of space travel, have revealed a number of small improvements we might be able to make to our existing life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Reducing the cost of building life support systems is one of those things we often have to do that we don't want to advertise too much. It's hard enough finding naval recruits as it is.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By minimizing the amount of weight and space our life support systems take up, we leave more room for our life reduction systems, which is what we're now calling guns.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Our growing familiarity with force fields has enabled us to replace our mechanical life support systems with more elegant field based processors. Food is now stored in a single block of nutrient-rich sludge, piped directly into the user's mouth.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By aerating the nutrient sludge we provide our crews it takes up significantly more volume in their stomachs, making them feel full with less food. There are some associated problems with, uh, gas, but we're coming up with special filters to address that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now really, really cheap. Still effective though, let's not forget that. Maybe let's not even call them cheap. "Economical," or "Value," maybe.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of efficient field generators, and also putting our crews on a diet, we've been able to reduce the mass of our life support systems even more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The Promethion Support System extends our field life support further, with all the requirements for a living organism - oxygen, water, and food - now piped directly into that organism rather than left to float around and get on the equipment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the crews are finding out how little we're spending on their life support systems. "Do you think we're worthless?" they shout. And we don't, we really don't. They're not worthless at all! Worth less, yes. But that's different.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our nutrient sludge now delivers itself to the crew using embedded Promethion field effectors, saving us the weight of carrying around heavy fixed effectors. The embedded effectors come out in the waste stream, ready for reuse. After cleaning, of course.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now close to perfect, wasting no resources whatsoever and recycling essentially all waste products. As an added bonus, the fields have been reduced in size and are now much less humiliating for the crew.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings, and small hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our ship construction operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures. We're not quite there yet, but the first step out of the well was always going to be the biggest.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Shipyard manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: You can't put just anyone in a space suit and get them to build things in orbit. It turns out that most people don't understand what an orbit is. Some improved training programs should dramatically improve our orbital manufacturing capability.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting material to the right orbit at the right time is something we're only just coming to grips with. It turns out that orbital plane change maneuvers are really expensive. But once we scale this up, our logistical ability should greatly improve.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ironically enough, space is at a premium in space, inside of our hulls at least. Even small improvements in packing efficiencies are worth the effort of hunting them down.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of medium hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of our initial attempts at micro-gravity construction used clumsy variations of ground-based techniques, not far removed from banging rocks together. Now that we have a little more experience, we should be able to build on a much larger scale.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After donating a few hulls for weapons practice, we were able to see the structural damage inflicted on them, and identify structural reinforcements that should toughen each ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Worksite planning in an orbital environment is a seriously complicated business, but now that we've got the hang of it, we should see significant cost savings for every hull we construct.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able us to build hollow structural elements still capable of handling very high compression loads. By maximizing the use of these and routing various ancillary ship systems through the cavities, we can save space for mission critical equipment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLargeScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of large hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Building larger hulls is more involved than just adding more stuff to them. Ensuring that they won't collapse under acceleration is a serious challenge. Seating, to ensure our crews doesn't collapse under acceleration is another surprising challenge.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems counter-intuitive, but by introducing very small weaknesses in the molecular structure of our hulls, we can make them deformable in controlled ways, making our hulls quite a bit more resilient.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of self-propelled manufacturing equipment will allow our workers to maneuver inside of hulls with much greater ease, reducing the challenge and expense of construction.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: As our hulls grew ever larger, we began to lose some of the art of packing that our predecessors had. But now thanks to the scale of our ships, even very small improvements in packing can lead to more room for everything else.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of huge hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're building massive ships capable of blotting out the stars. Obviously any ship can blot out the stars if you get close enough to it. You just don't have to get very close to these ones for that to be the case. Nor would you want to.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: That we build the best ships in the galaxy is undeniable, but that we do it so economically is what's really impressive. Our enemies have never been menaced so thriftily.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in the field of bristling, never before have our ships been so bristling with weapons. They could also bristle with other things we suppose.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tougher hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything as long as we don't ask too many questions about them. Nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases will be able to repair damage during battle itself.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These Tough little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters, designed to be more compact and packable, and the improved repair, reloading, and recovery facilities that go with them, we're now able to deploy high-capacity carriers.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship, it's another thing to keep it running. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Shipyards

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces Shipyard decay rate.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs humanity has ever created. Any improvement we can make to the management and operation of these beasts will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well. The part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't have ships without the resources to build them. The same can be said for lots of things actually. Improved mining technologies will benefit every aspect of our civilization. At least the aspects of our civilization which require building things.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mining operations are capable of generating more resources while losing less miners than ever before. The miners rejoice! Well. Not rejoice, exactly. They seem less grumpy than usual. Still, that's something.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Valuable resources can be found in most asteroids in extremely low concentrations. Extracting these hasn't been practical until the development of probes capable of independently navigating the subsurface to collect the goodies within.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniaturizing our resource extraction probes to the nano-scale has allowed for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. Additionally, the rarest of rare resources can now feasibly be targeted for extraction.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of weapons technologies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about who or what we might find in the galaxy. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against a yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether light, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of it all at one place.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage output of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're a bit more so.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a collimated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Manufacturing beam weapons is as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually tune each weapon. But if we can standardize this a bit, and even automate portions of it, we should be able to reduce the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The heaviest parts of beam weapons have always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. But with the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to generate collimated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the energy density limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe. So that's good news.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found that the capacity of our beam energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which allows for increased beam output. Such fields could be projected at a distance, improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam outputs. Additionally, we can now build beams that can cripple enemy shields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking, and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. But the latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: By embedding a device in our warheads which releases a high energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing the destructive potential of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPayloadMastery1_ShortDec
