StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPayloadMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new field based guidance system which uses forcefields to provide final maneuvering capabilities should cut down on the weight of our missiles systems a bit more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor piercing technology with our latest anti-matter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare Torpedoes at.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship and starbase modules which can improve the tracking and ultimately the range of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of specifically targeting and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our missile support systems can now make use of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, which allow for more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantity, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply problems. But that's finally been addressed, and we should see cost savings across all of our kinetic weapon programs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Tight clusters of particles emitted at high velocity gets around some of the practical limitations of slug based mass drivers. These pulse cannons have similar tactical characteristics as previous kinetic weapons. They're just more powerful.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newest superconductors and the steeper energy delivery curves they enable should lead to higher muzzle velocities, at the trade off of smaller projectiles. These weapons should have a longer effective range with no reduction in damage potential.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils and their less-strenuous cooling requirements make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. We can feel free to cram more of them into whatever we're cramming them in to.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By launching pulses of gravitons we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of enemy ships that they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage, and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy right before they die.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: "We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly and cheaply now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons, having made them as mass efficient as theoretically possible, allowing even our smallest vessels to pack a hellacious punch.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro singularities that collapse into existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. And our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We already have a significant amount of structures in orbit and on the ground, all of which can be militarized with modest extra investment and some new uniforms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military's regular training exercises are beginning to pay off, and we can now expect our soldiers to be far more effective when conducting ground-based operations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't assume that our space-based defenses will always be effective. Our worlds will be significantly more secure if we can harden our ground fortifications and prepare plans to rapidly form colonial militias when they're needed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiVicious_Name
StringTable.String: Vicious

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiVicious_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Soldiering and Resistance.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiVicious_Dec
StringTable.String: The Snathi know that being small makes us vulnerable to the larger races. However, we make up for our size with pure viciousness. There are many advantages to always starting a battle with a low blow.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. A little hard to imagine it, but we must accept that humans are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun itself.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal. But EMPs and targeted hacking attacks can cripple an enemy's coordination and limit the effectiveness of their defenses without needing to risk any of our own viscera.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Let's be honest. If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to pretend we're the good guys. Yes we'll have to live with the consequences of using biological weapons. But at least we'll be the ones who live.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any hostiles. Also liquefy them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: There are massive benefits in unit reliability and coordination if our troops are programmed to unfailingly do what we tell them to. And we won't have to feel so bad about losing these ones.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of invasion transports, along with a new generation of soldiers that don't mind being stacked like firewood, allows us to put boots on the ground faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Fortification

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't neglect our own defenses, and with the latest generation of defensive fortifications, our planets and starbases will be able to put up a much tougher fight.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Bombardment Shelters

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By moving our most critical structures underground, and providing similar shelters for civilians and troops, we can dramatically limit the effectiveness of most forms of orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Systems Hardening

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive experts have identified a number of vulnerabilities in our ground-based C&C systems, and urgently recommend that we harden them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Vaccinations

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to conventionally vaccinate against an unknown biological attack. Adaptive vaccines are engineered lifeforms that lie dormant, ready to rapidly assist a immune system to fight new infections the moment they appear.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and take some of the defensive responsibility off of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryDefenseDome_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defense Dome

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a shielded dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Naval crews are notoriously squishy, and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to do something, or they're going to stop getting in the ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of shields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Deflecting or diffusing incoming weapon fire is really, really hard, and we're far from having a really good understanding of it. Our latest round of research has only succeeded in making existing shield systems a bit cheaper to build.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our point defenses fire more crap into the space around the ship is a simple solution to a complicated question. Though still a surprisingly effective one.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of armor.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By adjusting the size and positioning of our armor panels, we've been able to minimize overlap and other inefficiencies, and can now provide the same level of protection to our ships for less overall weight.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be the most popular. So we've done that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The first few generation of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields, the so-called Barrier Field, is capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it. This dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The first generation of energy absorbers in our Barrier Field systems used a model of capacitor which occasionally exploded violently. Crews had decidedly mixed feelings about this, so we replaced those capacitors with a slightly more robust model.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Since the first few shield emitters went out the door, we've slowly been able to achieve some economies of scale in the manufacture of these systems, reducing the cost of all future installations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We've recently been able to shave a ton of weight off of our shield generators thanks to the latest generation of superconductors and their less extensive cooling requirements.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Cheaper shields never meant less effective shields, and it's only taken a few decades for our crews to finally understand that. Which is good, because our shields are spectacularly cheap now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to make the energy emitters of our shields any denser our engineers claim. They claim that kind of thing a lot and always take it back later, but they seem pretty sure this time.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: "Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields. But those would be some pretty terrifying weapons, and even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment the shields of friendly ships. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of the energy fields needed to create and maintain shields has resulted in a couple interesting new technologies, capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, or massively shielding friendly units within range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Arrays of tiny computer controlled railguns that track and destroy incoming missiles are unparalleled at protecting ships and starbases from missile attacks, though they still aren't terribly helpful at defending against other classes of weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of various missile performance envelopes has led us to adjust the firing patterns of our point defense systems, making them a bit more effective.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor equipment our point defense systems use is fairly specialized equipment that was initially quite rare and costly. Now that we're building a lot of point defenses, the price of those systems is starting to come down.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The slugs fired by point defenses don't need to be large, and were limited by the fact that we couldn't build railguns any smaller. But now that we can build more compact units, we should see significant weight savings for all our point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: By deploying electronic counter measures which interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, we've greatly increased the survivability of our ships and starbases. Against missiles at least. Still hard to confuse a laser.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's always a generational game of leap frog being played between missile designers and ECM designers, but we believe our latest algorithms have given us the leg up on the bad guys this time.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest attempts at ECM suites were heavily customizable, requiring a great deal of hand tuning to make them perform at their best. Now that we know what works, we can automate much more of the manufacturing and installation process.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first ECM suites were cobbled together from a half dozen different processors and transmitters. We've since streamlined those into a single unit which weighs much less.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: By installing our point defense systems on drone platforms that orbit our ships at a distance, we can add a valuable extra layer of protection against missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSystemMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: To be fair, only a few of our drone systems have ever actually shot each other in combat situations. But by minimizing that just a little bit more, we should be able to make our point defenses a little more cost-effective, if a bit less funny.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSystemMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we realized point defense drones don't need much personal space, we were able to start packing them in a lot tighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in point defense technology, featuring the latest generation of micro-drones armed with railguns, ECM and smart chafe. Aereon systems fill the space around a ship with a cloud of debris so thick no enemy missiles are likely to survive.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience working with small scale point defenses has led to a type of long range missile tracking system which should enhance the point defense capabilities of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Wide area missile disruptors enhance the effectiveness of our existing counter measures, adding a much needed layer of extra missile security to our fleets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleet-wide drone systems will provide massive missile security to an entire fleet. Additionally we can now equip point defense disruptors, essentially a type of counter-counter-measure, which should boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: A big lump of ultra-dense material remains an effective, if unsubtle, method of protection from modern space-based weaponry. Subtlety is overrated though.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A simple mistake by one of our fabricators resulted in a set of armor panels marginally denser and more resilient than we'd seen before. It took us a long time to replicate that mistake, but now that we have, our ships should be a little tougher to kill.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest challenges with armor manufacturing was simply the logistics of moving rare and heavy resources and materials around. Now that we've got our supply chain sorted out, we can expect to see some nice cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By its very nature, armor is always going to be a fairly mass-intensive means of protection. That said, we can do a few things to improve the precision and fit of armor plating, which should cut down on weight a bit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Certain materials, when stacked in specific arrangements have a synergistic effect on the strength of their neighbors under compressive forces. We call these new composites Durantium, and they should tremendously increase the survivability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful study of battle-damaged ships has revealed previously unknown weaknesses in our armor systems. Basically, we know why some of them were cracking in half now. We'll do something about that right away.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If our crews ask, it's not that our armor is cheap. It's that we've found a more efficient way of manufacturing it. But yes, it is pretty cheap.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the arrangement of our Durantium composites has revealed that we can get away with slightly less dense materials at certain layers with no impact to the armor's effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor uses a new type of lamination which causes surrounding materials to partially fluidize on impact, deforming in a recoverable way. Impacts are spread out over a much larger area, then flow back into its original shape.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: With modern armoring systems, the design of the armor informs the shape of the ship as much as the other way around. Properly armoring a ship involves a complicated series of trade offs, which when we get right, mean ships protected for much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: On a weight basis, our armor systems are now as efficient as they can possibly be, 99.3% of all total installed mass dedicated to offensive energy absorption or dispersion. That's really, really good the researchers promise.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have a hard time proving zero point armor even exists, only knowing of it by the effect it has. It appears to tap into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum to repulse incoming energy. It's almost impossibly tough, we can prove that much.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: In the factory, we've begun producing armor plating with a variety of force field based technologies. By adapting these fields into ship modules, we can create a hardening effect at a distance, making every ship in a fleet substantially more durable.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The fields that we use to generate hardening effects have twenty seven different "poles" which can be cycled through, changing the alignment of the hardening effects in the affected material, generating substantially stronger, more resilient materials.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntegrityFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Integrity Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest generation of armoring fields no longer just generate hardening effects at a distance, but can induce material fluidization and shape recovery. These new Integrity Fields can make our fleets invulnerable to all but the most powerful attacks.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Governance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of communications technologies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. Which presents an incredible danger, but also, perhaps, an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: In our absence, it seems that a great number of new races has arisen in the galaxy. We have found it useful to learn their pathetic languages so we know what they have that worth that is taking.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've begun simulating different rhetorical and diplomatic approaches when dealing with aliens, revealing several ways we might improve their attitudes towards us. Our role-playing has enabled us to talk prettier, essentially.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our culture has a way of communicating what our diplomats cannot. By increasing the ease with which other civilizations can access our culture we can win hearts and minds before we even get to the negotiating table.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The way we see the universe doesn't have to be unique to us. By clearly communicating our thinking to outside parties, they may begin seeing the same way as us, boosting whatever effects we hoped our ideology might cause.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization on this scale parallels our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. A history we'd better refamiliarize ourselves with quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in our harbors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Federalist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Federalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Federalist parties advocate a relatively weak central government that offloads much of its responsibility to lower, more local governmental groups. This bias towards local regulation seems to encourage economic development.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Populist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Populist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Populist forms of government are designed to make people happy, even at the cost of economic strength. As a side-effect of this relentless interest in pleasing others, Populist governments are often very good at diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Universalist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Universalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments attempt to be all things to all people. That can be a lot of people, none of whom ever seem to agree on anything, but a balanced approach like this at least ensures a government has no weak spots.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By granting limited powers of self rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and all the benefits which come with it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Industrialist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Industrialist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Industrialist governments seek to maximize industrial capacity by rewarding citizens based entirely on their productivity. From top to bottom, society is organized to encourage hard work and not having fun.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Mercantile Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Mercantile Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Mercantilists seek to ensure their civilization's prosperity through trade, via careful negotiations, brutally unfair tariff, and outright espionage.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Technologist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Technologist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Any time two civilizations have met the less technologically advanced one has come out worse from the encounter. Technologists dedicate all governmental resources to ensure that they never become that dumber civilization.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has obvious merits in terms of approval and productivity, although adapting it to a civilization this big has proven challenging.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of War Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's because they consider all other civilizations to be inferior, or simply terrifying, members of the War Party are willing to put their entire civilization on a military footing to do something about it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Pacifist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Pacifist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pacifist governments forego the language of aggression and militarization and focus all their efforts on promoting culture and social welfare. This makes them well liked in the galactic community, and their words travel far.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Tolerance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: At times, it proves necessary to work with the pathetically weak races of the galaxy. By tolerating their existence (and perhaps working with them for a while) we can find new ways to kill them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will lower tariffs and other obstacles that discourage business activities. When well designed, these treaties should result in increased wealth for both parties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By increasing the interchange of cultural products and making it easier for civilians to cross borders, we can hope to increase the influence we have on our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By entering into formal information sharing agreements with other civilizations, our researchers can more easily accumulate the masses of data which modern research often requires.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: Turning a friendly species into a formal ally is a supremely delicate process. There's only one way these talks can go right, and a thousand ways they can go wrong. The etiquette of alien handshakes alone is fraught with peril.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Formal military alliances will make a war with humanity that much more imposing to our foes. The trade-off is that we risk being drawn into wars not of our choosing. Friends are cheap to have, but allies can be very expensive indeed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A technological alliance will dramatically ramp up the research sharing programs we have with our ally. This is valuable information, so we must be sure of their friendship before entering such an agreement.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal cultural alliance will lower almost all barriers to the movement of people and ideas across borders with our neighbor. Not only will this bring us closer, we can hope to have a bigger influence on our neighbor's culture.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A civilization which takes diplomacy seriously and has a long record of fair-minded dealing will always carry a greater voice at the bargaining table. Our people are building that reputation now, and are stronger for it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMajestyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Majesty

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMajestyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of assimilation treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy wants to believe every word we say. So sterling is our reputation, that our diplomats often find whole worlds begging to join our culture. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: There's a shocking amount of backroom dealing which goes on behind the surface of the United Planets. But that's how the sausage is made, and we'll do well if we're better at it than our enemies. And our allies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: Our allies have long been convinced of the benefits of our friendship. Now they see the benefit of our wisdom and leadership. We can no rely on their unwavering support on all United Planets matters.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: A strong cultural presence, on our worlds and our neighbors' has tremendous long term potential. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective at securing humanity's future.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our culture has made inroads on the planets of our neighbors, we can help cement this influence by encouraging our biggest stars to regularly visit and vacation there, serving as ambassadors for our way of life.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Although artists and designers aren't naturally inclined towards thinking about money, after we locked a few of them in a room with an accountant for a bit, they managed to find a number of ways they could do their work more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural facilities cost real money to maintain. By encouraging our artists and directors to reuse materials, props, and punch lines whenever possible, we can reduce the ongoing costs of running these enterprises.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By adapting our cultural products to cast scientists and researchers in a more favorable light, we might find appreciative audiences among research communities.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which focuses on its leaders is a fine thing to have when those leaders are doing a good job. When the leaders aren't doing a good job, it's filled with harsh satire and unflattering impressions, so watch out for that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If people have money, let's not make them ashamed of it. By encouraging displays of conspicuous consumption and a culture which celebrates wealth, we can gain a great deal of influence with people living the good life.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Humans are admired throughout the galaxy, reflecting the success of our civilization. If we can make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: Foreign cultures have such backwards ideas that we'll find great value in quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals. By doing so can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more still.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no other culture in the galaxy but ours, and anyone who claims otherwise is a heretic. Or just dumb. All sane beings will soon bow down before our celebrities and thinkers.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Other universes deserve the benefit of humanity's wisdom and culture. Indeed, it's a bit offensive that they don't see it already. Our thinkers are now beginning to prepare plans for shining our light on the next world, and beyond.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which spans the stars is a pretty complicated beast. We don't need to understand it all of course, just supply the facilities and light regulations for the free market to get to work doing what it does best.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases wealth.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: With targeted tax rates, we can encourage a number of different areas of our economy. A tax policy which favors business and investment should ultimately lead to a wealthier economy for example. Unless the businesses and investors were lying to us.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases approval.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By targeting economic policy to support workers and the civilian population in general, we can ensure we have a much broader base of approval to build our civilization on.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds trade route.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Encouraging and supporting trade is a great way to both bring in extra income and forge closer ties with our neighbors. Everyone's happy when they're making money.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer distance between buyers and sellers in this economy has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics. At minimum, some new banking and economic structures will be required to deal with all the complications.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Capital can now be transferred instantaneously. This has allowed a variety of creative arbitrage opportunities, which will require new regulations and banking theory to contain.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases trade route income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which prioritizes external trading will be well suited to exploit the wealth of the greater galactic community, or just exploit the greater galactic community in general.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a certain art in the framing of a treaty, and even in an agreement between equals, one party can be more equal than the other. Let's be that more equal party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By reducing the obstacles that foreign tourists might face when trying to visit us, we can encourage more of them to travel here and more of their money to stay here.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated financial sectors should help facilitate the flow of capital across our civilization, which will result in more things being built in the places they need to. Wealth creation, in other words, which we can tap for a variety of purposes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Stock exchanges have proven remarkably elusive to establish in this galaxy, and only the most recent advances in communications technology and regulatory capability have made them possible.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Exchanging goods with our neighbors will theoretically enrich us both, and is worth pursuing for that reason alone. Also, if we play it smart, it can enrich us a lot more than the other guy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is the establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our recourses enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Trade

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing fixed trading hubs and encouraging the markets which develop around them, the wealth of the entire galactic community will flow through our hands. Our ever so slightly sticky hands.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff stations on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes, more trade income, who no need for Tariffs, or 'Luxury items', Some times its best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer volume of goods that pass through a trading port is staggering, and we'll need new facilities to manage the flow of goods smoothly. And safely. We've had a few too many large masses make dock workers very, very flat.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Masters

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is synonymous with wealth and trading, and all intelligent beings know our markets are the only viable place to show their goods. And of course certain advantages accrue to the owners of such a monopoly.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoEntertainment_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Entertainment

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases Approval.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiXenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: Without the approval of our people, we won't be able to accomplish very much. Distracting them with various amusements is perhaps a cynical ploy, but it might be easier than trying to treat them as the rational beings they're so often not.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarTourism_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Tourism

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only can we distract our own citizens with amusements, we can begin luring friendly visitors from our galactic neighbors. This will not only help improve relations, it should result in extra income for us.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPopulationDiversion_Name
StringTable.String: Population Diversion

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPopulationDiversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPopulationDiversion_Dec
StringTable.String: More amusements! Bigger amusements! Human beings are dreadfully simple sometimes, which is distressing on some level, even if it does make them pretty easy to manage.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiApprovalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy. With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiApprovalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything, and they will think it is fun.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiApprovalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSuperiorRecreation_Name
StringTable.String: Superior Recreation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSuperiorRecreation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSuperiorRecreation_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero gravity beaches are a tough concept to wrap your head around, and even tougher to build. But that hasn't stopped them from becoming insanely popular, even if they do get in the hair and teeth a lot more than the regular kind.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiContentmentTech_Name
StringTable.String: Contentment

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiContentmentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiContentmentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out the answer we were looking for this whole time was simply injecting happiness into the base of the skull. Virtual worlds offer anything a person could desire at a fraction of the cost of actually giving it to them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: Space is, for people not involved with day to day civilization building, incredibly boring. And it's still a bit deadly. But if we were to spruce it up a bit, there might be some profit in sending tourists there.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The galactic community is beginning to realize just how awesome humanity is, and if they aren't, we'll soon be airing targeted advertisements which tell them to. The increased tourism revenue is anticipated to be a nice bonus.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPilgrimageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pilgrimage

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There's not a single being in this galaxy that doesn't want to make a visit to human space. For many of them, it's a religious requirement. Our home has become the most important destination that intelligent life has ever known.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves colonial buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: It only took a few horrific accidents for us to finally come to grips with the challenges of off-world industry, and now that we have, we've identified a number of ways we can begin improving and specializing our industrial capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Construction Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Seemingly small improvements can have a big effect when applied to large projects, and we're working on some very large projects now indeed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no getting around it: "Incremental improvements in manufacturing techniques" isn't much of a headline. Which is a shame, considering the benefit we expect to see from them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: If it can be dreamed up, we can build it. Indeed, many of our economists now believe that the limiting factor of our industrial capacity is our own imaginations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMolecularSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: What we can do with Molecular Fabrication is amazing, particularly if we specialize.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Research Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Researchers are great at inventing things, but surprisingly bad at the business of inventing things. A number of inefficient research practices have developed which we really need to improve upon.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechnologicalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechnologicalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The lab equipment needed to research some of these new fields is incredibly expensive and esoteric. Specializing our research efforts may be necessary to make the most rapid advances.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've made great strides with our colonization techniques in the past few years, and can now begin considering specific areas we'd like to improve upon.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our farming processes will lead to a number of benefits which will help our civilization for a very long time. Until people stop needing food, really.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Farming Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Although all this attention we pay to improving our farming techniques sometimes make our farmers uncomfortable - they do get set in their ways - the improvements to our food production capacity are too great to ignore.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farms now provide an almost unlimited bounty, the food doing much of the hard work itself. Admittedly, the first time you see a plant or animal self-harvest is a little grim, and school field trips have certainly gotten a lot harder.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Environment Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnvironmentOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've reached the stage where we can optimize our program of environmental modifications to suit specific civil programs. Good news for us, although we have yet to ask the environment how it feels about this.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves potential of extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Mastering living on an extreme world will make life there a lot more tolerable for the poor fools who volunteered for it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBiospherePerfection_Name
StringTable.String: Biosphere Perfection

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBiospherePerfection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves potential of extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our colonists suffer in their own homes. Even the deadliest of planets are now perfectly survivable to us.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves ship systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a bit of experience sending ships out into the darkness and having most of them come back, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our equipment and navigational techniques.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've seen them in wide-scale use, we've identified a number of ways we can make our new Ion Drive systems more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warp field technology is incredibly complicated, and has in more than a few cases, caused a researcher's brains to melt a little bit. But now that we have some experience working with them, we've identified a number of ways to improve their design.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves drives.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships are already the fastest in the galaxy, our engineers heralded as heroes wherever they go. Fortunately for us, they don't like going out much, instead preferring to keep looking for more improvements to make to their precious engines.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A concentrated effort to optimize our sensor systems could lead to a number of different improvements or efficiencies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As is usually the case when equipment is sent to the field, the technicians who actually use our sensors soon came up with a number of different ways to improve their efficiency and effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We don't anticipate any further increases in the viewing range of our sensors, not until we leave this universe for another one. But we can certainly make them a little more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Scavenging Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get more out of the ships you scavenge

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiScavengingSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our knack for salvaging ships comes in handy, but with a bit of work we can pry even more goodies out of them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Precursor relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Having captured a few Precursor relics and observed the impact they have on our research and culture, we can now try adjusting our Precursor studies to benefit specific areas of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Everyone in the navy is very excited that we're trying to optimize our life support systems, and would certainly cheer if they weren't conserving their air.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our early attempts at building field-based life support systems left behind many messes and many possible opportunities for improvement, which we're starting to identify now. Cleaning up the messes: that was the obvious one.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered direct-nutrient injection technologies, and now have left but a few additional efficiencies to wring out of these systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've watched a few construction projects accidentally collapse on themselves, we've identified a number of possible improvements we can make to our orbital construction techniques.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We took a big step forward with our most recent adoption of true zero-gravity construction practices. Now, after a few trial runs and one teensy little accident, our engineers have identified further areas for improvement.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Construction Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We're getting better and better at large scale construction with every passing day, and a number of more efficient design practices are beginning to show up on our engineers' drawing tables. Along with the offensive doodles which have always been there.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves hulls.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We're still finding ways to improve our shipyards, even though they're already the envy of the civilized galaxy. In the uncivilized galaxy they're a bit less envied, but we've never gotten along with those guys anyways.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCarrierFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Carrier Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCarrierFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves carriers.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's nothing like doing something a few times to see how terrible you are at it. After a few hilarious mishaps, we've identified a few ways we can improve our carrier operations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Logistical Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of space accountants are becoming trained as we speak, capable of improving logistical efficiencies most people would be too bored to ever notice.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: By dedicating their efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, our researchers believe they can deliver a number of more efficient weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
