StringTable.String: Weapons researchers have to keep paces with advances in many other fields to get the most out of their inventions. Right now, recent advances in material sciences are opening the door to a new generation of more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of data returned from the field has revealed a number of inefficiencies which we can begin addressing in the next generation of our beam systems. We may also finally be able to get rid of that funny smell they make.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons are now absurdly powerful, a terror for anyone foolish enough to get on humanity's wrong side. And yet still our weapon scientists find ways to do better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After blowing up several thousand target drones and one unfortunate asteroid, our weapons engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can implement for our missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We've spent comparatively little research time on the warhead components of our missile systems, but now that we've turned our attention to the matter, a number of possible efficiencies should be achievable with a little effort.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPayloadMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Payload Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPayloadMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Various physical limits of this particular universe prevent us from wringing more destructive potential out of this generation of warheads. But we can certainly make them cheaper and lighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some modest improvements in the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons could result in improvements to the cost, mass, or range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Acceleration Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent advances in superconducting technology should lead to improvements in the critical energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: After several generations of whipping things at other things as fast as possible, our scientists are now really quite good at it. There remain but a few small efficiencies to wring out of the field.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Military Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Oversight is certainly the least glamorous aspect of keeping a standing army, which is sad considering the benefit it provides. Improving our military administration will result in very real tactical benefits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvasionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Invasion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvasionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Good news! We've developed some new, possibly amoral, certainly effective techniques for pacifying enemy ground forces.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravitationalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitational Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravitationalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces. These are powerful weapons we're giving to guys with pretty thick skulls, so we should definitely remember to keep an eye on them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion defenses.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military theoreticians have analyzed reports of the latest invasion tactics in use in the galaxy and come up with a number of elegant ways to counter them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: After studying the wreckage of a few vessels we've lost in combat, our engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can make to our defensive technologies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've received quite a bit of useful data on real world performance of our shield systems, and have devised several possible improvements we can begin making to them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier System Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful design review of our initial implementation of the Barrier Field system has revealed a number of possible avenues for further improvements. Who says design reviews are unexciting?

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shielding technology approaches perfection, our engineers pushing the capabilities of our shield systems right to their theoretical limits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our point defense systems should lead to a number of different performance gains. Like possibly less exploded ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have some field data on ECM suite performance, we've identified a number of different ways we can improve upon the design and construction of those systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSystemMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Drone System Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSystemMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems dramatically increased the sheer volume of our point defense capabilities, so any small improvement in their design should lead to significant cost or weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've blown up lots and lots of slabs of armor on the test range, and have come up with a few possible improvements we could make to our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor systems have increased significantly in complexity, and our efforts to model their behavior under impact is only now catching up. This research should help lead to more effective or efficient designs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of hardening techniques is almost complete, and the galaxy trembles at the girth of our vessels. But even perfection can be improved upon it seems. Some more effort should lead to cheaper or more efficient armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves diplomatic effects.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The words we use have a limited ability to affect the way we think, and by studying the vocabulary used by our neighbors, we may unlock valuable insights into their mindsets. And possibly even find out how to manipulate them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Political Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are several broad ways to organize the government of a space faring civilization, all of which pose distinct advantages and disadvantages. Rest assured, there's no right choice here; regardless of what we pick, everyone will tell us that we made the wrong choice.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Political Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As we continue to manage, and often mis-manage, our affairs, it's become clear that a number of political theories we'd never previously considered viable might actually be very practical when practiced on a galactic scale.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Political Mastery

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Coordinating the direction of an entire galactic civilization is tremendously difficult. But thanks to advances in deceit and brain injection technology, we can now put this whole show entirely on a war footing, or, if we choose, the exact opposite.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Depending on the current state of our civilization, we profit more from some types of treaties than others, and should begin slanting our diplomatic posture in those directions right away.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAllianceFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Alliance Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAllianceFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced alliances.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Alliances come in a variety of flavors, some of which may be more advantageous to us than others. We should consider our civilization's priorities - and what our new ally is actually good for - before entering such talks.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on specific worlds.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Few works of art and cultural artifacts have broad appeal, and it's often necessary to target one's audience to some extent. By fine tuning the tone and content of our cultural products, we might appeal to demographics which are particularly valuable to us.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Commerce Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases economic benefits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience managing and regulating markets on a massive scale, we're now able to target specific economic improvements we might like to see.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a better understanding of the quirks of galactic scale economies, we can begin trimming back the regulations and policies that seem to be causing inefficiencies in specific industries and areas.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Optimization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases trade income.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading is as much an art as a science, but by inducing our traders to use just a smidge more science, they might be able to maximize their profits when dealing with certain counterparties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a reputation as fair dealers and market makers, it should be possible to target our trading activities to encourage specific economic sectors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiApprovalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Approval Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiApprovalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases approval on specific planets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_SnathiApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural engineers inform us that some well planned manipulations of our cultural materials could make our people happier with what they already have. Which seems too good of an opportunity to pass up.
